item.description:
What a great fantastic showing of newbies, oldies, those that left and came back, and those that had summer things to do and returned, and of course great looking guests - Trina he's a keeper :) even though he beat me at cribbage :( :( :( Duane, not a nice thing to do to Micki.....

New member Jen had some great winning games, even against Bette, who was not feeling well :( and hopefully Jen will return and Noelle (who I pegged out on while she only had two pegs to go) came back and so did Deb who return to the fold, A*W*E*S*O*M*E ! !

And of course Gabe who always thinks he beats Larry and I before 6:00, but do they really count since cribbage doesn't start until six ? ? ? ! ! ! and then he speaks french to us so we don't know what he is saying to us ...... and then, and then those awesome pictures he has been taking, thank you, it is always fun to let me lose to you :) and Larry, great counting - keep up the good work.

And Dave, it is so good to have you back keeping us in shape and Joe, it was so awesome to see you again, welcome back to MA and letting me peg out on you and Dave. I always want to have you sitting to my left so you can keep passing me great pegging......And there is always Karen who keeps me on my toes :)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with all of our cribbage boards out :)
item.name: Cribbage Meet Up in Waltham - SPOOKY TIMES WITH SKUNKS !!!
